1409070.name: Adventure of Elysia
1409070.description:
Adventure of Elysia is a story-driven RPG in which you visit the mysterious island of Elysia and attempt to uncover its hidden secret.

Explore diverse areas, meet unusual characters, solve puzzles, and decide how you deal with your enemies. Kill them to increase your attack power, or spare them to strengthen your defense. Or do you take the golden path between both choices.

Throughout your journey, you will unlock new abilities and items that open up new paths and help you discover the truth behind the island.
1409070.supported_languages:
德语*, 英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
